tool.name: BuildDataSources

param.name: masterDataSourcesTable
param.displayname: Excel Table with Master List of DataSource Info:
param.dialogReference: A master excel table with DataSourceIDs and the corresponding references and URLs. The header names should be "FOLDERNAME" (DataSourceIDs), "AUTHORS", "SOURCEURL", and "REFERENCE".

param.name: gdb
param.dialogReference: A file geodatabase. NOTE: ASSUMES ALL FEATURE CLASSES WILL BE CONTAINED WITHIN FEATURE DATASETS - DONT INPUT THE FEATURE DATASET, BUT THE GEODATABASE THAT CONTAINS IT

param.name: exampleBlankDataSourceTable
param.dialogReference: A correctly formatted "blank" DataSources table. Note: We created this using the GeMS "Create New Database" tool, which adds a single entry to the table of FGDC-STD-013-2006. The code assumes this will be present in the otherwise blank table.

tool.summary: This tool builds a DataSources table from all the DataSourceIDs in the GDB and a master table.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool builds a DataSources table from all the DataSourceIDs in the GDB and a master table.
